name: Task Get Results
description: Retrieve the results of a previously created Parallel.ai research task using its run_id. This integration polls for task completion and returns the final research results with structured data and citations. Use after creating a task with 'Parallel Task Create'.

inputs.title: Parallel API Key
inputs.description: Your Parallel.ai API key for authenticating requests.

inputs.title: Task Run ID
inputs.description: The run_id returned from 'Parallel Task Create'. This identifies the specific research task to retrieve results for.

inputs.title: Timeout (seconds)
inputs.description: Maximum time to wait for the task to complete in seconds. Pro and Ultra processors can take up to 15 minutes (900 seconds) to complete.
